## AVRO\_ADAPTER\_SCHEMA\_PROVIDER variable

Injection token used for providing AvroAdapterSchemaProvider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AVRO_ADAPTER_SCHEMA_PROVIDER: InjectionToken<AvroAdapterSchemaProvider>
```
